page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: MOST CHILDREN LIKE{SWIMMING,RIDING {BIKES,PLAYING COMPUTERS}AND OTHER SPORTS.LOTS OF PEOPLE DO THEIR HOBBIES LIKE{MOTORBIKE RIDING}AND{HORSE {RIDING.}LOTS OF CHILDREN DO QUIET HOBBIES SUCH AS{READING,WATCHING T.V. AND{BIRD WATCHING.}SOME HOBBIES HAVE END PRODUCTS LIKE{WOODWORK,DRAWING, {HANDICRAFT}AND{COOKERY.}ADULTS HAVE HOBBIES AS WELL.ADULTS PLAY A LOT OF SPORT LIKE{GOLF,DARTS AND {TENNIS.}QUITE A LOT OF WOMEN DO {AEROBICS.}NEARLY EVERYONE ENJOYS GARDENING OF SOME SORT AND MANY JOG TO KEEP FIT.SOME OF THE HOBBIES ADULTS DO ARE EXPENSIVE LIKE{PHOTOGRAPHY,HORSE {RACING,WATER SKIING, MUSIC}AND{WINE {MAKING.}MOST PEOPLE JUST DO ORDINARY THINGS LIKE{STAMP COLLECTING {HANDYCRAFTS}AND GOING ON{WALKS.}SOME PEOPLE JUST LIKE TO SIT AND WATCH{T.V. {}
